name.baseName: 直接还原铁生产;直接还原铁;氢基还原（全部）

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Direct Reduced Iron (DRI) produced through the hydrogen-based reduction process is typically used within the steelmaking industry. As a raw material, this form of iron is instrumental for steel production facilities that aim to reduce their reliance on traditional blast furnace methods and decrease carbon emissions. It is suitable for manufacturing various steel products, adhering to environmental standards.
采用氢基还原工艺生产的直接还原铁通常用于钢铁制造行业。作为原材料，这种形式的铁对于希望减少依赖传统高炉方法和降低碳排放的钢铁生产设施至关重要。它适用于制造各种符合环保标准的钢铁产品。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: The average operating data of Coal-DR, NG-DR (MID), and NG-DR (ENE) demonstration projects in China are used as the benchmark for the LCI of DR routes.

technology.technologicalApplicability: Direct Reduced Iron (DRI) produced through the hydrogen-based reduction process is typically used within the steelmaking industry. As a raw material, this form of iron is instrumental for steel production facilities that aim to reduce their reliance on traditional blast furnace methods and decrease carbon emissions. It is suitable for manufacturing various steel products, adhering to environmental standards.
采用氢基还原工艺生产的直接还原铁通常用于钢铁制造行业。作为原材料，这种形式的铁对于希望减少依赖传统高炉方法和降低碳排放的钢铁生产设施至关重要。它适用于制造各种符合环保标准的钢铁产品。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataTreatmentAndExtrapolationsPrinciples: LCI of COG-DR and H-DR routes, which is not scaled-up in China are estimated based on Coal-DR routes combined with literature data from simulations, laboratory tests, and process modeling in Table 9 [49,50]. referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: The carbon reduction potential of hydrogen in the low carbon transition of the iron and steel industry: The case of China
The carbon reduction potential of hydrogen in the low carbon transition of the iron and steel industry: The case of China

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When integrating the LCI data of DRI production into a Life Cycle Assessment, users must consider the specific regional context of the data, which is based on the average operating data from projects in China. As the LCI for Coal-DR, NG-DR, and H-DR routes not scaled up in China are estimated rather than measured, users should account for this by considering additional uncertainty in the results. Data should be contextualized with current technological advancements and should not be applied directly to different technological or geographical contexts without adjustments. Special attention should be paid to the methodological differences in the inclusion or exclusion of recycling, as well as specific use phase modeling behavior, which may affect the final environmental impact assessment.

在将直接还原铁生产的生命周期库存（LCI）数据融入生命周期评估时，用户必须考虑数据的特定区域背景，该数据基于中国项目的平均运行数据。由于在中国尚未规模化的Coal-DR、NG-DR和H-DR路线的LCI是基于估算而非实测得出的，用户在评估时需要对此额外考虑结果的不确定性。数据使用时应与当前技术进步情况相结合，并且未经调整不应直接应用于不同的技术或地理环境。在生命周期评估过程中，应特别注意包括或排除回收的方法学差异及特定使用阶段建模行为，这可能会影响最终的环境影响评估。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses
